task.name: repeatflag
task.shortdescription: Task for transferring flags from a frequency averaged measurement set to a native resolution measurement set.
task.description: Note that this is tested only for cases where the frequency averaged measurement set was derived from the native one with the split task.

param.name: visfrom
param.description: Name of visibility file from which flags are read

param.name: visto
param.description: Name of visibility file to which flags are written

param.name: fieldfrom
param.description: Fields in visfrom for which flags are read

param.name: fieldto
param.description: Fields in visto for which flags are written
